create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where rentinformationtower_id = #{rentinformationtowerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and business_confirm_number = #{businessConfirmNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
